actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

official_title: To expand the definition of limited tax benefit for purposes of the Line Item Veto Act.

summary.text: Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to revise the definition of limited tax benefit under the Line Item Veto Act to: (1) repeal exceptions; and (2) redefine it to mean any tax provision that has the practical effect of providing a benefit in the form of different treatment to a particular taxpayer or a limited class of taxpayers, regardless of whether such provision is limited by its terms to a particular taxpayer or class of taxpayers.

titles.title: To expand the definition of limited tax benefit for purposes of the Line Item Veto Act.
